Player History
Signed as a free agent by Chicago on 3/3/1986 to a minor league contract.
Traded from Chicago to Montreal on 5/11/1989 (Going to MON: CF Ken Griffey Jr., 1B Cecil Fielder, C Craig Biggio, C Rick Wilkins. Going to CHC: P Randy Johnson)...
Injured on 8/22/1992 with a Broken Ribs, out for 7 weeks...
Had first career hit on 4/14/1993, off Ron Darling (PHI)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/2/1993, off Danny Cox (ATL)...
